Quote: Love is made up of three unconditional properties in equal measure:1. Acceptance2. Understanding3. AppreciationRemove any one of the three and the triangle falls apart.Which, by the way, is something highly inadvisable. Think about it â€” do you really want to live in a world of only two dimensions?So, for the love of a triangle, please keep love whole.
Author: Vera Nazarian,  The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration
